alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Orleans, southeastern St. Tammany Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Hancock Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pearlington, or 12 miles southeast of Slidell, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Lake Catherine and Pearlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
